translations: n.[车辆]拖车（trailer 的复数形式）；篇身片；追踪者
v.用拖车载运（trailer 的第三人称单数形式）

phrs.translation: 挂车制动器；超速制动器
[美]活动住屋或（家庭拖车的）停车场

sentences.sentence: The trailers will be rented for one-way trips.
sentences.translation: 这些拖车将被租用于单程旅行。

sentences.sentence: Horses (and cattle) have to be shipped from one rodeo to the next, often in double-deck trailers.
sentences.translation: 马（和牛）不得不被从一个竞技秀的地点运输到下一个地点，通常是用双层拖车。

sentences.sentence: For instance, highway overpasses had to be high enough to allow trailers carrying military missiles to pass under them.
sentences.translation: 例如，高速公路立交桥必须足够高，以便让运载军用导弹的拖车通过。
